Hello there! idk what ya call it but, in Turkey we use this triangle that called '' 90-60-30 üçgeni'' 90-60 and 30 represents the degrees of the triangle. So we can say the edge that sees 90 degree is equals to 1, this causes to the another edge that sees 60 degrees it will be 1 root 3. And the last edge that sees 30 degrees is the half of 90 degrees, so it will be 1/2. This triangle is one of special triangles. You can search it as 30-60-90 triangle from the net. I hope it would help!
If you look up and study special triangles it will make sense. You don’t have to know why just memorise the rules and it will become second nature.
